column4: I just got Ubuntu Netbook Remix Jaunty for my Eee PC and it's running extremely slowly.  Are there any tweaks I can do to make it quicker?
the netbook versions aren't suppourted here as far as I know.
thanks.  is there a support channel for netbook remix?
I think there is a #eepc  channel  and  well there's  #easypeasy ,but your running the other one by the sounds of it
